files.description: Recipe scripts (execution order: verification,installation,verification,after, if fails executes rollback)

verification.description: Check script that return true if the dependency already exists in the host computer

installation.description: Recipe script that has all the command that need to execute for installed dependency

after.description: Post installation script that execute after recipe was executed and verification script returns true

rollback.description: Rollback script that execute if something fails in the recipe script
